mapper.select: SELECT movie_comment.id as id, movie_comment.content as content, movie_comment.comment_user_id as comment_user_id, movie_comment.movie_id as movie_id, movie_comment.like_count as like_count, movie_comment.unlike_count as dislike_count, movie_comment.create_time as create_time, movie_comment.update_time as update_time, users.name as comment_user_name, users.cover as comment_user_avatar, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM movie_reply WHERE movie_reply.movie_comment_id = movie_comment.id AND movie_reply.deleted = 0 ) AS reply_count FROM movie_comment LEFT JOIN users ON movie_comment.comment_user_id = users.id WHERE movie_comment.deleted = 0 AND movie_comment.movie_id = #{query.movieId} ORDER BY movie_comment.update_time DESC
